articles.content: The US military said that it sunk three Houthi vessels in the Red Sea in a statement on Sunday, and killed 10 fighters of the Yemeni armed group after a clash in the middle of one of the worlds most … [+4756 chars]

articles.content: Earlier this month, Microsoft finally launched its AI companion Copilot on Android, and at that time, the app was not available for Apple users. That changes today as the company has now launched the… [+1634 chars]

Security experts have identified 25 new apps that could cause chaos for Android users.
